name: Push it to the limit
description:
Made during Post Grind Jam #1

----------------------------------

"Push it to the limit" is a side-scroller bullet hell game where you have to collect energy by killing enemies to feed your ship
Controls
----------------------------------
Keyboard
WASD to move
SPACE to shoot
----------------------------------
PS4 Controller
LEFT STICK to move
QUAD to shoot
----------------------------------

Created by
Diego Cugno
Angelo Portaluri
Admir Hyka

----------------------------------
